PolicyPage.Name: Move-In Day
PolicyPage.Title: Move-In Day
PolicyPage.Abstract: According to approved housing contracts, occupancy can begin September 8, 2011 for all Fall 2011 contracts. Please contact your manager for more details regarding move-in times and procedures.
PolicyPage.BodyCopy:
According to approved housing contracts, occupancy can begin at 8 a.m. on the day listed as the contract start date for semester-length contracts. Please contact your manager for more details regarding any special arranagements regarding move-in times and/or complex-specific move-in procedures.

Move-In/Out Dates:

Winter 2014

January 3, 2014 / April 12, 2014 after 6 pm

Block February 25 by appointment only

Spring 2014

April 18, 2014 / July 23, 2014 after 6 pm

Block June 7, 2014 by appointment only

Summer Session 2014

July 26, 2014 / September 12 by appointment only

Fall 2014

September 12, 2014 / December 20, 2014 after 6 pm

Special Circumstances

All move-ins are to be done on move in day. Special cases where a student needs to come early are generally arranged with the manager of the respective complex. The university does ask for accommodation for students are involved in working "Get Connected," that they may be allowed to arrive early for training and preparation to meet and greet incoming new students.

On-campus Employment

Generally speaking, on-campus housing does allow for early arrival if students have on-campus employment requiring them to arrive early. For off-campus Approved Housing, please speak with your manager.

Questions

Please direct any questions or potential special arrangements to be made with your manager or for on-campus housing, the Housing & Student Living Office.
